key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny and legal challenges, including AML compliance and potential misrepresentation of loan portfolio
Cybersecurity risks due to digital-first operations
Intense market competition from traditional banks and fintech companies
Customer service issues impacting retention and brand reputation
controversies: Ongoing investigation following allegations by Hindenburg Research
Unresolved lawsuit involving investors who purchased shares prior to March 2016
social_issues: Customer service complaints and recurring billing issues
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance challenges and potential legal liabilities
Ethical concerns related to customer service and cybersecurity practices
